data.md:MetaData: Lithology of sediment core VJUUS, Väike Juusa, Estonia
Eutrophic dimictic lake. Physiography: glaciokarstic lake. Surrounding vegetation: mixed spruce forest,cultivated grassland. Location: centre of the lake. Additional Device: Livingston corer.
Spatio-temporal distribution of pollen in Lake Väike-Juusa (South Estonia) sediments
